short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple Snake game with a green theme and high score tracking.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Experience the classic Snake game in a convenient popup! With smooth animations and a saved high score feature, you can enjoy playing Snake anytime and anywhere without needing to open a new window. Unlike many alternatives, this extension keeps track of your high score, so you can easily share your best achievements with friends instead of trying to remember them.
